txt.en: You have selected Lar as your favourite to win
The race has begun! Betting is now closed
Lar has won the race!
You have a vested interest in Lar's success as he runs the Summer Festival Keg-hopping Race.
Lar has lost the race
Lar has lost the race
Lar has lost the race
You have left the race area

'Well, [placeholder], good day to you! It is often said that there is nothing better than fine summer weather, though it is a little balmy for my taste this time of year. I am sweltering where I stand!

'These lazy summer days can drag on, which is why we look forward to the Festival events! This year, inhabitants of Thorin's Hall are racing to finish the Keg-hopping Race event as quickly as possible. Who do you think will win?

'I think Lar is the strongest candidate. I don't know that I have ever seen a faster dwarf, nor a less quenchable thirst! If you agree, you should select him.'

Tickets for the race can be picked up at Jorfi at the Keg-hopping race. Tickets can be turned in to place a wager.\n\nYou will need to hand over a Festival Ticket in order to select Lar as your favourite to win.
'I see you had some luck at the keg-races! Allow me to be the first to bid you congratulations on your excellent luck, [placeholder]. Here is your reward.'
The Keg-Hopping Race begins soon on this very track.\n\nYou think that Lar will win the race, and you should observe whether or not this comes to pass.
Arnar can be found in the Keg-race area during the Summer Festival.\n\nYou should speak with Arnar and collect the bountiful prize he has to offer for your excellent luck.
'Watch the race, [placeholder]; see if Lar will prove the hardiest of all!'
'You think Lar's your dwarf? Well then, hand me one of your Festival Tickets, and I'll jot down your wager on him.\n\n'Good luck, [placeholder]!'
'Sorry, [placeholder]. I'm afraid you'll need a Festival Ticket in order to select a contestant.\n\n'Jorfi is handing out tickets in Thorin's Hall...I'd go see him right away!'
Turn in a Festival Ticket to select Lar
Observe the race to see if Lar is victorious
Talk to Arnar
Do not leave the race area
Keg-hopping Race: Leg It, Lar
